useCase.name: Viewing and Adding Notes
useCase.description: User views account information and adds notes to the account.

preconditions.precondition: User is logged in and has navigated to the account page.

mainSequence.step: User clicks on the 'Add account note' button in the header
User navigates to the 'Add Note' page
User inputs data in the 'Add Note' page
System saves the note to the database
System returns the created note data in JSON format
User navigates back to the account page
